ED_Title: Programme  planning (Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee))
ED_DecisionText: At its 49th plenary meeting, on 9 December 2021, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee). (Footnote: A/76/426)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
